author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY... ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORT LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH OVER  THE PAST FEW HOURS...
summary:
...BERYL EXPECTED TO BRING LIFE-THREATENING WINDS AND STORM SURGE TO JAMAICA ON WEDNESDAY... ...HURRICANE HUNTER AIRCRAFT REPORT LITTLE CHANGE IN STRENGTH OVER  THE PAST FEW HOURS...
 As of 8:00 AM AST Tue Jul 2
 the center of Beryl was located near 15.0, -67.9
 with movement WNW at 22 mph.
 The minimum central pressure was 934 mb
 with maximum sustained winds of about 165 mph.
